justification: Acknowledges B’s love of deep threats/rookies but ignores B’s strategy of buying injured players and need context (TE room, QB). Offer is lopsided: A gives a healthy Tier 1 RB for TE4/WR4—poor for a 1-7 team needing wins. Minimal separation of A vs. B incentives and very thin rationale. Probability of B acceptance likely underestimated given value tilt.
